[[Image:Sun House Pin.png|thumb|200px|right|A map showing the location of Sun House on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Sun House''' is a castle in [[the Reach]], the region controlled by [[House Tyrell]] of [[Highgarden]]. The castle is located on the south coast of [[Westeros]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/highgarden/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Highgarden entry]</ref> It is the seat of [[House Cuy]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Sun House is the seat of House Cuy and is located on the [[Summer Sea]] near the mouth of the [[Torentine]]. It was called 'Sun House' on the maps of the earlier books, but in the more recent novels it has been changed to 'Sunflower Hall'.
